name: PIYO PIYO SKI JUMP
description:
"I am definitely going to get the PERFECT V-style jumping!"
George, a rooster, often dreams of flying in the air.
One day, he saw a ski jump.
Get the perfect jumping and seize the glory!

[How to play]
Touch & Hold 2 fingers on top of the Skies on the screen, then Geoge will start running.
He will pick up speed while you keep your fingers on them.

Watch out for the timing.
As he takes off the jumping hill, spread your fingers to the shape V-style so that his form will be jumping form.
Keep your fingers on the screen until he lands.

Good shape of V-style will make his jump longer.

* Careful! His speed will reduce if you spread your fingers while his running.
